name: Orangutan Battle Simulator DEMO
description:
Arrow keys - walk, jump, crouch, etc.

Space - Charge. -- Hold

Q - Attack1 -- You need 5 charge to use. - Finishing Move

E - Attack2 -- You need 4 charge to use. - Special Attack

W - Attack 3 -- You need 2 charge to use. - Normal Attack

--Co-op controls--

Controls: 

WASD Plr2 walk.

Arrows Plr1 walk

123 Plr2 attacks

JKL plr1 attacks

Space plr1 charge

X plr2 charge
